thread.title: Ohio nursing homes among the nation's lowest rated in quality of care: A Critical Choice
thread.title_full: Ohio nursing homes among the nation's lowest rated in quality of care: A Critical Choice

author: John Caniglia & Jo Ellen Corrigan, The Plain Dealer
title: Ohio nursing homes among the nation's lowest rated in quality of care: A Critical Choice
text: Dozens of residents in Ohio nursing homes have died over the past few years in incidents involving their care, a Plain Dealer review of inspection reports shows. A federal statistical measure, meanwhile, rates Ohio's nursing homes among the nation's lowest in average quality of care.
